verses.verse: Beloved <S%G27><s%>, I <S%G2172>pray<s%> <S%G2137>that<s%> <S%G4012>in<s%> all <S%G3956>things<s%> <S%G4571>thou<s%> mayest <S%G2137>prosper<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> be in <S%G5198>health<s%>, even <S%G2531>as<s%> <S%G4675>thy<s%> <S%G5590>soul<s%> <S%G2137>prospereth<s%>.

For <S%G1063><s%> I <S%G5463>rejoiced<s%> <S%G3029>greatly<s%>, when <S%G80>brethren<s%> <S%G2064>came<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> bare witness <S%G3140>unto<s%> <S%G4675>thy<s%> <S%G225>truth<s%>, even <S%G2531>as<s%> <S%G4771>thou<s%> <S%G4043>walkest<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G225>truth<s%>.

Greater <S%G3186><s%> <S%G5479>joy<s%> <S%G2192>have<s%> I <S%G3756>none<s%> <S%G2443>than<s%> <S%G191>this<s%>, to hear of <S%G1699>my<s%> <S%G5043>children<s%> <S%G4043>walking<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G225>truth<s%>.

Beloved <S%G27><s%>, thou <S%G4160>doest<s%> a <S%G4103>faithful<s%> work in <S%G3739>whatsoever<s%> thou <S%G2038>doest<s%> <S%G1519>toward<s%> them that are <S%G80>brethren<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3581>strangers<s%> <S%G1519>withal<s%>;

who <S%G3739><s%> bare <S%G3140>witness<s%> to <S%G4675>thy<s%> <S%G26>love<s%> <S%G1799>before<s%> the <S%G1577>church<s%>: <S%G3739>whom<s%> thou wilt <S%G4160>do<s%> <S%G2573>well<s%> to set forward on their <S%G4311>journey<s%> <S%G516>worthily<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%>:

because <S%G1063>that<s%> <S%G5228>for<s%> the <S%G5228>sake<s%> of <S%G846>the<s%> <S%G3686>Name<s%> they went <S%G1831>forth<s%>, <S%G2983>taking<s%> <S%G3367>nothing<s%> <S%G575>of<s%> the <S%G1484>Gentiles<s%>.
We <S%G2249><s%> <S%G3767>therefore<s%> <S%G3784>ought<s%> to <S%G618>welcome<s%> <S%G5108>such<s%>, <S%G2443>that<s%> we may <S%G1096>be<s%> <S%G4904>fellow-workers<s%> for the <S%G225>truth<s%>.

I wrote somewhat <S%G1125>unto<s%> the <S%G1577>church<s%>: <S%G235>but<s%> <S%G1361>Diotrephes<s%>, who loveth to have the <S%G5383>preeminence<s%> among <S%G846>them<s%>, <S%G1926>receiveth<s%> <S%G2248>us<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%>.

Therefore <S%G5124><s%>, <S%G1437>if<s%> I <S%G2064>come<s%>, I will bring to <S%G5279>remembrance<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G2041>works<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> he <S%G4160>doeth<s%>, prating <S%G5396>against<s%> <S%G2248>us<s%> <S%G3056>with<s%> <S%G4190>wicked<s%> <S%G3056>words<s%>: <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3361>not<s%> <S%G714>content<s%> <S%G5125>therewith<s%>, <S%G3777>neither<s%> <S%G1926>doth<s%> he <S%G846>himself<s%> <S%G1926>receive<s%> the <S%G80>brethren<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> them that <S%G1014>would<s%> he <S%G2967>forbiddeth<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1544>casteth<s%> them out <S%G1537>of<s%> the <S%G1577>church<s%>.

Beloved <S%G27><s%>, <S%G3401>imitate<s%> <S%G3361>not<s%> that which <S%G3588>is<s%> <S%G2556>evil<s%>, <S%G235>but<s%> that which <S%G3588>is<s%> <S%G18>good<s%>. <S%G3588>He<s%> that doeth <S%G15>good<s%> <S%G2076>is<s%> <S%G1537>of<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%>: <S%G1161><s%> <S%G3588>he<s%> that doeth <S%G2554>evil<s%> <S%G3708>hath<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G3708>seen<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%>.

Demetrius <S%G1216><s%> hath the <S%G3140>witness<s%> <S%G5259>of<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G2532>men<s%>, and <S%G5259>of<s%> the <S%G225>truth<s%> <S%G846>itself<s%>: <S%G1161>yea<s%>, <S%G2532><s%> <S%G2249>we<s%> also bear <S%G3140>witness<s%>: <S%G2532>and<s%> thou <S%G1492>knowest<s%> <S%G3754>that<s%> <S%G2257>our<s%> <S%G3141>witness<s%> <S%G2076>is<s%> <S%G227>true<s%>.

I <S%G2192>had<s%> many <S%G4183>things<s%> to <S%G1125>write<s%> unto <S%G235>thee<s%>, but I <S%G2309>am<s%> <S%G3756>unwilling<s%> to <S%G1125>write<s%> them to <S%G4671>thee<s%> <S%G1223>with<s%> <S%G3188>ink<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2563>pen<s%>:

but <S%G1161><s%> I <S%G1679>hope<s%> <S%G2112>shortly<s%> to <S%G1492>see<s%> <S%G4571>thee<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> we <S%G1492>shall<s%> <S%G2980>speak<s%> <S%G4750>face<s%> <S%G4314>to<s%> <S%G4750>face<s%>. <S%G1515>Peace<s%> be unto <S%G4671>thee<s%>. The <S%G5384>friends<s%> <S%G782>salute<s%> <S%G4571>thee<s%>. <S%G782>Salute<s%> the <S%G5384>friends<s%> <S%G2596>by<s%> <S%G3686>name<s%>.
